blur_detection.description: The document shows clear text with sharp edges and well-defined characters throughout.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the document has excellent clarity suitable for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The document exhibits high contrast between black text and white background with clear red headers.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No action needed as contrast is excellent for automated text extraction.

glare_identification.description: No glare or reflective spots are visible on the document surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as the image is free from glare issues.

water_stains.description: No water damage, stains or discoloration are present on the document.
water_stains.recommendation: No action needed as the document appears clean and undamaged by moisture.

tears_or_folds.description: The document appears flat with no visible creases, folds, or physical damage.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the document is in excellent physical condition.

cut_off_detection.description: The document appears to be missing the bottom portion with payment details that are referenced in the text.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Capture the next page that contains the payment information as mentioned in the footer text.

missing_sections.description: The receipt references payment details on the next page which are not included in this image.
missing_sections.recommendation: Capture the second page that contains payment information to ensure complete document processing.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions are visible on the document.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from obstructions.
